languages.text: {n}Вы тоже чувствуете этот запах и ощущаете небольшой ожог на пальцах. А еще — что ваши губы беспощадно искусаны до запекшихся ран.{/n}
{n}You can smell it too, and you feel slight burn marks on your fingers. You notice one more thing — your lips feel rough and dry, like they have been nipped over and over by another's teeth.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы тоже чувствуете этот запах и ощущаете небольшой ожог на пальцах. А еще — что ваши губы беспощадно искусаны до запекшихся ран.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You can smell it too, and you feel slight burn marks on your fingers. You notice one more thing — your lips feel rough and dry, like they have been nipped over and over by another's teeth.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}You can smell it too, and you feel slight burn marks on your fingers. You notice one more thing — your lips feel rough and dry, like they have been nipped over and over by another's teeth.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}你也同样能闻到这样的味道，你的手指上还带着轻微的灼烧痕迹。你还注意到了另一件事情——你的嘴唇又干又涩，仿佛某个人用牙齿轻咬了一遍又一遍。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You can smell it too, and you feel slight burn marks on your fingers. You notice one more thing — your lips feel rough and dry, like they have been nipped over and over by another's teeth.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你也同样能闻到这样的味道，你的手指上还带着轻微的灼烧痕迹。你还注意到了另一件事情——你的嘴唇又干又涩，仿佛某个人用牙齿轻咬了一遍又一遍。{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}あなたにもその匂いを感じられる。さらには、指にかすかな火傷のあとも感じる。他にも気付いたことがあった ― 唇が荒れ、乾燥している事に気づいたのだ。まるで、他の誰かの歯に噛まれたかのように。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You can smell it too, and you feel slight burn marks on your fingers. You notice one more thing — your lips feel rough and dry, like they have been nipped over and over by another's teeth.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたにもその匂いを感じられる。さらには、指にかすかな火傷のあとも感じる。他にも気付いたことがあった ― 唇が荒れ、乾燥している事に気づいたのだ。まるで、他の誰かの歯に噛まれたかのように。{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Tú también la hueles y notas leves quemaduras en los dedos. También notas que tienes los labios ásperos y secos. Como si alguien los hubiera mordisqueado una y otra vez.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You can smell it too, and you feel slight burn marks on your fingers. You notice one more thing — your lips feel rough and dry, like they have been nipped over and over by another's teeth.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tú también la hueles y notas leves quemaduras en los dedos. También notas que tienes los labios ásperos y secos. Como si alguien los hubiera mordisqueado una y otra vez.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Vous la sentez également, ainsi que de légères brûlures au bout de vos doigts. Et vous remarquez une autre chose : vos lèvres sont sèches et rugueuses, comme si elles avaient été mordillées pendant des heures par les dents de quelqu'un d'autre.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You can smell it too, and you feel slight burn marks on your fingers. You notice one more thing — your lips feel rough and dry, like they have been nipped over and over by another's teeth.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous la sentez également, ainsi que de légères brûlures au bout de vos doigts. Et vous remarquez une autre chose : vos lèvres sont sèches et rugueuses, comme si elles avaient été mordillées pendant des heures par les dents de quelqu'un d'autre.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Auch dir liegt der Geruch noch in der Nase und du spürst an deinen Fingern Brandwunden. Und dir fällt noch was auf – deine Lippen fühlen sich rau und trocken an, als hätte sie irgendwer mehrfach angeknabbert.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You can smell it too, and you feel slight burn marks on your fingers. You notice one more thing — your lips feel rough and dry, like they have been nipped over and over by another's teeth.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Auch dir liegt der Geruch noch in der Nase und du spürst an deinen Fingern Brandwunden. Und dir fällt noch was auf – deine Lippen fühlen sich rau und trocken an, als hätte sie irgendwer mehrfach angeknabbert.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Kokuyu sen de alabiliyorsun. Parmaklarında da hafif yanık izleri var. Bir şey daha fark ediyorsun: Dudakların kuru ve sert. Sanki birinin dişlerince tekrar tekrar ısırılmış gibi.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You can smell it too, and you feel slight burn marks on your fingers. You notice one more thing — your lips feel rough and dry, like they have been nipped over and over by another's teeth.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Kokuyu sen de alabiliyorsun. Parmaklarında da hafif yanık izleri var. Bir şey daha fark ediyorsun: Dudakların kuru ve sert. Sanki birinin dişleri tarafından tekrar tekrar ısırılmış gibi.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
